note:
Student Hacks for Campus Life:
Student Hacks - not referring to short cuts but easy and helpful ways to get things done as a university student.
Campus Life - surviving being a student and the campus community you find yourself in as a student during the course of your study years at your particular tertiary institution.
The idea behind this platform is to create some kind of support and exchange of information or advice among fellow students; be it sharing some study advice or simple recipe.
